All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddAuthorServlet
Handles the logic for adding a new author.
AuthorBusinessLogic
The AuthorBusinessLogic class serves as the business logic layer for operations related to authors.
AuthorDAO
DAO interface for operations related to the Authors table.
AuthorDAOImpl
Implementation of AuthorDAO interface
AuthorDTO
Lab Section: 013 CST8288
ControllerServlet
Redirects to different Servlets
DataSource
Student Number: 041072185 Lab Section: 013 CST8288
DeleteAuthorServlet
Servlet to handle the Deletion of records from the Authors database.
getAllAuthors
Servlet that handles retrieval and display of all authors from the database.
GetAuthorByIdServlet
This Servlet allows for the searching of authors via ID in the database.
LoginServlet
LoginServlet handles database authentication for the Author Management System.
LogoutServlet
LogoutServlet handles user logout functionality for the Author Management System.
UpdateAuthorServlet
Servlet responsible for updating an author.
